label: 水駅
本: The Tale of Genji (Penguin Classics) . Viking Adult . 2001
説明文: Literally, "water, and stabling for the horses," but actually wine and hot rice gruel offered participants in the New Year’s mumming (see entry).  Certain stops along the route were designated as mizumumaya, while at others, called iimumaya, the mummers could expect a meal.[水駅、飯駅][RK]
